elph.visualizationÔÉÅ

Functions

get_sigma(pair, delta, temp, mode, n) Read transfer integrals of displacements systems and calculate sigma
heat_atoms(molpair, sigma_eav) Scatter plot of atoms with heat indicating the highest contributions to sigma.
heat_modes(molpair, sigma_eav, vecs_eav, n) Scatter plot of atoms with arrows indicating phonon displacements of n phonons modes with the highest sigma contributions.
sigma_contribution(pair_atoms, dj_av, temp) Standard deviation (sigma) in function of modes, atoms and directions.
view([mode, n]) Main function of the visualization module.
